select_demo.label: Select Demo Store
select_demo.comment: Choose the demo store you want to import.

import_type.label: Import Type
import_type.comment: Choose the demo content you want to import.

lazy_loading.label: Enable Lazy Loading of Images
lazy_loading.comment: If yes, images outside the viewport will be loaded as the user scrolls down the page, improving initial page load.

catalog_min_product_width.label: Product's Minimum Width (Grid view)
catalog_min_product_width.comment: The products on the catalog page are automatically resized to fit evenly on each row according to the device width. You can increase or decrease this value if you need larger or smaller product's previews (or to show more or less products on each row).

keep_image_aspect_ratio.label: Keep Image Aspect Ratio (Use Masonry Layout)
keep_image_aspect_ratio.comment: If yes, height of the images will be calculated automatically based on width. If product images have different heights a masonry layout will be used.

remove_image_padding.label: Remove Image Padding
remove_image_padding.comment: If yes, white space around image is removed.

product_box_border_radius.label: Product Box Border Radius
product_box_border_radius.comment: Add rounded corners to product box (e.g. 5) Enter zero (0) for square corners.

catalog_show_color_options.label: Show Color Options
catalog_show_color_options.comment: If Yes, color options of configurable products will be shown.

empty_category_featured.label: Featured Products Widget in "Empty Catalog" Page
empty_category_featured.comment: Selected Featured Products widget will be displayed in category page when the collection is empty. You can create new Featured Product widgets in Theme->Featured Products

no_results_featured.label: Featured Products Widget in "No Results" Search Page
no_results_featured.comment: Selected Featured Products widget will be displayed in search results page when no results are available. You can create new Featured Product widgets in Theme->Featured Products

keep_image_aspect_ratio.label: Keep Image Aspect Ratio
keep_image_aspect_ratio.comment: If yes, height of the images will be calculated automatically based on width

image_fixed_height.label: Set Images Fixed Height
image_fixed_height.comment: Enter a fixed height in pixels (e.g. 500)

base_font_size.label: Root's Font Size
base_font_size.comment: The font size of most elements and texts are relative to the root's font size. Depending on the chosen font you may need to increase or decrease this value.

font_family.label: Font Family
font_family.comment: Select Google Fonts, a predefined font stack or type in your custom font stack.

font_subset.label: Character Sets
font_subset.comment: Tip: If you choose only the languages that you need, you'll help prevent slowness on your webpage.

font_styles.label: Font Styles
font_styles.comment: Tip: Using many font styles can slow down your webpage, so only select the font styles that you actually need. Recommended styles for the theme are 300, 300 Italic, 400, 400 Italic and 600.

additional_info.label: Top info
additional_info.comment: You can put here your phone or any other important message.

show_home_link.label: Home Link
show_home_link.comment: Enable this option to display a "Home" link on main menu.

show_categories.label: Show Categories
show_categories.comment: Enable this option to show categories on main menu.

sec_menu.label: Enable Secondary Menu
sec_menu.comment: Enable this menu if your store has multiple languages or currencies, to allow users to switch between them.

mega-menu-right-block-hide-width.label: Hide Right Block on Mega-Menu When Viewport is Smaller Than This Value
mega-menu-right-block-hide-width.comment: In pixels. When viewport is narrower than this width, the Right Block of the Mega-Menu will be hidden to avoid clutter. Leave blank to never hide.

newsletter.label: Newsletter Subscribe Form
newsletter.comment: If disabled, newsletter subscribe form can be substituted by a static block with identifier "footer_top_left".

load_custom_css.label: Load Custom CSS File
load_custom_css.comment: If enabled, custom CSS file located at "skin/frontend/intenso/default/css/custom.css" will be loaded on every page. Use that file to put your own CSS styles.

popup_type.label: Display Pop-up On
popup_type.comment: Exit pop-ups can't be shown on touch screen devices

entry_time.label: Entry Time
entry_time.comment: Show the pop-up after the specified amount of seconds (e.g. 5)

background_image.label: Background Image for Medium and Large Screens

static_block.label: Static Block
static_block.comment: Select a static block with the content to be inserted inside the pop-up

static_block_width.label: Static Block Width
static_block_width.comment: Width of the static block in percentage (e.g. 60)

static_block_alignment.label: Static Block Alignment
static_block_alignment.comment: Select a static block with the content to be inserted inside the pop-up

sensitivity.label: Sensitivity
sensitivity.comment: The pop-up fires when the mouse cursor moves close to (or passes) the top of the viewport. You can define how far the mouse has to be before the pop-up fires. The higher the value, the more sensitive, and the more quickly the event will fire. Defaults to 20

delay.label: Delay
delay.comment: Time in milliseconds before showing the modal (e.g. 100) If the user's mouse re-enters the body before delay ms have passed, the modal will not appear. This can be used to provide a "grace period" for visitors instead of immediately presenting the modal window

cookie_expiration.label: Cookie Expiration
cookie_expiration.comment: Time period (in days) before the modal will appear again for a user

cookie_name.label: Cookie Name
cookie_name.comment: By changing the name, the pop-up will be shown again to all previous users

company_field.label: Use Company Field in Billing Address

page_max_width.label: Page Max Width
page_max_width.comment: Maximum width of the page in pixels. Should be between 300 and 1920. When the device's screen is larger than the width of the page, a boxed version of the page will be displayed.

form_fields_style.label: Form Fields Style
form_fields_style.comment: In case you experience issues with forms introduced by third-party extensions, select Classic or Classic Rounded.

default_text_color.label: Default Text Color
default_text_color.comment: Used as default color for text in paragraphs and lists.

main_color.label: Main Color
main_color.comment: Used in anchors, menus, highlights, buttons and several other elements across the site. Select a color compatible with your logo's color(s).

main_hover_color.label: Main Hover Color
main_hover_color.comment: Shown when the mouse is over a link or button.

page_background_color.label: Page Background Color
page_background_color.comment: Background color applied for all content sections of the site.

viewport_background_color.label: Viewport Background Color
viewport_background_color.comment: Background color of the web browser's viewport. Only visible when device's width is larger than website's maximum width.

buttons_border_radius.label: Buttons Border Radius
buttons_border_radius.comment: Enter a value between 1 and 20 (px) for rounded borders on all buttons. For buttons with square borders enter zero (0)

primary_button_hover_background_color.label: Primary Button Background Color on Hover

primary_button_hover_text_color.label: Primary Button Text Color on Hover

secondary_button_hover_background_color.label: Secondary Button Background Color on Hover

secondary_button_hover_text_color.label: Secondary Button Text Color on Hover

ghost_button_hover_border_color.label: Ghost Button Border Color on Hover

ghost_button_hover_text_color.label: Ghost Button Text Color on Hover

ghost_button_light_hover_border_color.label: Ghost Button Border Color on Hover

ghost_button_light_hover_text_color.label: Ghost Button Text Color on Hover

main_menu_style.label: Header Style
main_menu_style.comment: Transparent style applies only for home page

home_header_background.label: Header Background Color for Home Page
home_header_background.comment: Applies only for home page (except mobile)

header_opacity.label: Opacity
header_opacity.comment: In percentage. Enter a number between 0 (completely transparent) and 100 (completely opaque) to set the opacity for the home page header

header_separator_color.label: Header Separator Color
header_separator_color.comment: Horizontal line below the header that separates the header and the content on CMS pages, catalog view, product view and other pages.

header_separator_thickness.label: Header Separator Thickness
header_separator_thickness.comment: Thickness in pixels of the horizontal line below the header that separates the header and the content on CMS pages, catalog view, product view and other pages.

header_logo_max_width.label: Logo - Maximum Width
header_logo_max_width.comment: Sets a maximum width in pixels for the logo (e.g. 294) Enter zero (0) to display logo in its original size

header_logo_mobile_max_width.label: Logo for Mobile - Maximum Width
header_logo_mobile_max_width.comment: Sets a maximum width in pixels for the logo (e.g. 294) Enter zero (0) to display logo in its original size

header_logo_top_margin.label: Logo - Top Margin
header_logo_top_margin.comment: Sets the distance in pixels between the top of the page and the logo. Use it to position your logo and control the height of the header.

header_logo_bottom_margin.label: Logo - Bottom Margin
header_logo_bottom_margin.comment: Sets the distance in pixels between the logo and the main menu. Use it to position your logo and control the height of the header.

header_search_top_margin.label: Search Box - Top Margin
header_search_top_margin.comment: Sets the distance in pixels between the top of the page and the search box. Use it to position the search box and control the height of the header.

header_search_bottom_margin.label: Search Box - Bottom Margin
header_search_bottom_margin.comment: Sets the distance in pixels between the search box and the main menu. Use it to position the search box and control the height of the header.

header_header_main_menu_home.label: Main Menu (Only for Home Page when Transparent header is active)

sec_menu_font_size.label: Font Size
sec_menu_font_size.comment: In REM units. Only applicable when Secondary Menu Style is set to "Top ribbon" in Theme Setup > Header

sec_menu_text_color.label: Text Color
sec_menu_text_color.comment: Only applicable when Secondary Menu Style is set to "Top ribbon" in Theme Setup > Header

sec_menu_text_color_hover.label: Text Color on Hover
sec_menu_text_color_hover.comment: Only applicable when Secondary Menu Style is set to "Top ribbon" in Theme Setup > Header

sec_menu_background_color.label: Background Color
sec_menu_background_color.comment: Only applicable when Secondary Menu Style is set to "Top ribbon" in Theme Setup > Header

header_header_sec_menu_home.label: Secondary Menu (Only for Home Page when Transparent header is active)

home_sec_menu_text_color.label: Text Color
home_sec_menu_text_color.comment: Only applicable when Secondary Menu Style is set to "Top ribbon" in Theme Setup > Header

home_sec_menu_text_hover_color.label: Text Color on Hover
home_sec_menu_text_hover_color.comment: Only applicable when Secondary Menu Style is set to "Top ribbon" in Theme Setup > Header

footer_top_hover_color.label: Text and Icons Color on Hover

footer_newsletterbox_text_color_focus.label: Newsletter Input Text Color on Focus

footer_newsletterbox_border_color_hover.label: Newsletter Input Border Color on Hover

footer_newsletterbox_border_color_focus.label: Newsletter Input Border Color on Focus

footer_newsletterbox_submit_hover_backgr.label: Newsletter Submit Button Background on Hover

footer_newsletterbox_submit_hover_color.label: Newsletter Submit Button Text Color on Hover

footer_bottom_backtotop_hover_color.label: "Back to Top" Link Color on Hover

add_to_cart_box_background.label: Add to Cart Box - Background Color

header_sticky_nav_fixed.label: Sticky Navigation Menu Bar (when fixed on the top)

product_info_separator_color.label: Color of the Line that Separates each Section

customer_outside_background_color.label: Login, Forgot Password, Register, Reset Password and Logout Success Pages - Background Color

checkout_background_color.label: One Page Checkout and Multishipping Checkout Pages - Background Color
